movies.original_title: ปัง
movies.overview: Follows a ruthless hitman who, after narrowly escaping a fatal attempt on his life, betrays his gang in an effort to find forgiveness but ends up becoming a target himself.
movies.tagline: Once a killer, now the mark.
movies.title: Bang

movies.original_title: หมู่บ้านโคกะโหลก
movies.overview: A wave of chilling serial murders emerges, marked by the gruesome decay of male victims' secret part. As the police investigate, they confront eerie local myths and dark secrets.
movies.tagline: The legend awakens. terrifying. ridiculous. unstoppable.
movies.title: Ko Ga Loak Village

movies.original_title: บุปผาราตรี เฟส 2
movies.overview: Apartment 609 is still haunted by the ghost of a spurned young woman. And this causes problems for a bumbling gang of bank robbers whose loot has somehow found its way to that room.
movies.title: Rahtree Returns

movies.original_title: A Conversation with the Sun (Installation)
movies.overview: Interrogating the possibilities of an existence without his memories, A Conversation with the Sun draws on selected self-documented footage over several years – the means in which the artist has chosen to record his life since he embarked on filmmaking. Existing as a personal memory archive, these images together with published conversations between the artist and Artificial Intelligence (AI) generated cognitive specters of individuals and entities such as Jiddu Krishnamurti, Salvador Dali, the Sun, and others.
movies.title: A Conversation with the Sun (Installation)

movies.original_title: ทฤษฎีจีบเธอ Theory of Love: Special Episode "Stand By Me"
movies.overview: Before reaching the final scene, there are still untold stories. They return once again to complete the story.
movies.title: Theory of Love: Special Episode "Stand By Me"

movies.original_title: 6 Takes of Drama
movies.overview: This is a simple way to avoid many upsetting exchanges on social media nowadays due to impulsive posts. In fact, as the story goes, the more times you distill (6 to be exact), the better results you get.
movies.title: 6 Takes of Drama

movies.homepage: http://www.fivestarproduction.co.th/วอนทั้งโลกโขกหัวเธอ/
movies.original_title: วอนทั้งโลกโขกหัวเธอ
movies.overview: Charn is working on his thesis to convert the Concert Hall project to Music Complex, and his advisor suggests him to see Gerrard for any information regarding the project. Every time Charn went to see Gerrard, he keeps missing him. But he has a chance to meet Piengdao, who is working for Gerrard.
movies.title: Warn Tung Loke Khok Hua Thur

movies.original_title: นากรักมาก ม๊ากมาก
movies.overview: Two best friends, Peued and Uncle, set out to remake the timeless love legend of Mae Nak Phra Khanong, but things quickly spiral out of control when the real Mae Nak shows up to play herself. On a mission to find her true love, now reincarnated as Krist, a rising young actor.
movies.tagline: I'm coming to you with so much love!
movies.title: Nak Loves Mak Sooo Much!

movies.original_title: ตี๋ใหญ่ ฤกษ์ดาวโจร

movies.tagline: Meet the "King of Thieves", whose life is coming to an end.
movies.title: Tee Yai: Born to Be Bad

movies.original_title: องค์บาก
movies.overview: When the head of a statue sacred to a village is stolen, a young martial artist goes to the big city and finds himself taking on the underworld to retrieve it.
movies.tagline: No computer graphics. No stunt doubles. No wires.
movies.title: Ong-Bak

movies.original_title: ผีหัวขาด 2
movies.overview: Fai and Theung are good buddies. They want to get some money for gamble and foolishly decide to go to a Chinese graveyard to steal money from a corpse. Careless Theung bangs his head on a coffin and starts bleeding. His dripping blood revives an infamous headless corpse and causing it to awaken from its sleep. The headless corpse starts madly rampaging around the village until an old exorcist brings it under control by keeping its head and body in separate secure places....that is until Mek, a young guy, accidentally revives the headless corpse once again. Now, the headless dead man is alive and ready to hunt.
movies.title: Headless Hero 2

movies.original_title: LYKN - DAY1 TO DEBUT
movies.overview: Debut of 5 young winners from the program "Project Alpha" who have the ability to sing, dance and become a new artist.

tv_shows.name: LOVE (X)
tv_shows.original_name: LOVE (X)
tv_shows.overview:
This is the a ground-breaking and uplifting dating reality show made in Thailand, where 12 single men and women live together in Koh Samui, cut off from the outside world, pursuing boundless love. Through competitive games, they win dates and survival supplies. In the end, they'll make the final choice about who they want to keep seeing after the show.

"X" stands for the unknown, crossing paths and infinite possibilities—find the "X" of your dreams together!

tv_shows.name: Iron Chef Thailand
tv_shows.original_name: เชฟกระทะเหล็ก ประเทศไทย
tv_shows.overview: เชฟกระทะเหล็ก ประเทศไทย เป็นเกมโชว์การทำอาหาร ออกอากาศทุกวันพุธ เวลา 23.00 น. - 01.00 น. โดยเริ่มอากาศครั้งแรกเมื่อวันพุธที่ 25 มกราคม พ.ศ. 2555 ทางสถานีโทรทัศน์สีกองทัพบกช่อง 7 ตามรูปแบบของรายการ ยุทธการกระทะเหล็ก ที่ออกอากาศครั้งแรกวันที่ 10 ตุลาคม พ.ศ. 2536 โดยได้รับลิขสิทธิ์จากบริษัท ฟูจิ ครีเอทีฟ คอร์ปอเรชั่น จำกัด ประเทศญี่ปุ่น โดยได้รับลิขสิทธิ์ในการผลิตรายการนี้ ในอีกหลายภาษา

seasons.name: Specials

tv_shows.original_name: DMD Friendship The Reality
tv_shows.overview: A group of artist trainees compete in a reality show to develop skills and find the perfect partner to win a lead role in a new Domundi BL series.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A group of eight Domundi artist trainees come together in this reality show where they'll develop their skills and compete in a series of missions. All the while, they'll be working on their chemistry in the search for a partner they'll be compatible with both on and off screen. The prize is a the opportunity to perform as the lead couple in a new Domundi Y series.

seasons.name: It Takes Two
seasons.overview: A group of Domundi artist trainees come together in this reality show where they'll develop their skills and compete in a series of missions. All the while, they'll be working on their chemistry in the search for a partner they'll be compatible with both on and off screen.

tv_shows.name: I Can See Your Voice Thailand
tv_shows.original_name: นักร้องซ่อนแอบ
tv_shows.overview: Thailand version of the reality singing competition where g celebrities must correctly guess a real singer, based on appearance and a few hints only.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Presented with a group of seven "mystery singers" identified only by their occupation, a guest artist must attempt to eliminate bad singers from the group without ever hearing them sing, assisted by clues and a celebrity panel over the course of four rounds. At the end of the game, the last remaining mystery singer is revealed as either good or bad by means of a duet between them and one of the guest artists.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview:
The fourth season of the mystery music game show I Can See Your Voice Thailand will air November 4, 2020, on Workpoint TV. I Can See Your Voice Thailand is the Thai adaption of the South Korean program of the same name. The show is hosted by Kan Kantathavorn and Somkiat Chanphram.

However, due to the COVID-19 pandemic in Thailand, episodes will continue filming but with no audience admitted with enhanced COVID-19 safety protocols being in effect.

seasons.name: Festival
seasons.overview: For this season, under the original format, the guest artist can eliminate one or two mystery singers after each round. The game concludes with the last mystery singer standing that depends on outcome of a duet performance with a guest artist.

seasons.name: TPOP
seasons.overview: T-pop artists are presented with six singers whose singing abilities are a mystery. Through a series of four rounds, the guest artist is given new information that may or may not help them eliminate potential bad singers. In the end, the artist will learn if their final pick is in fact a good singer when they perform a duet with them.

tv_shows.name: Suea Chani Keng
tv_shows.original_name: เสือ ชะนี เก้ง
tv_shows.overview: Three BFFs live in the same condominium building and face life and love together. Tum, a playboy photographer who doesn’t believe in true love because his girlfriend left him with a luxury condominium to pay off alone. Oil, Tum’s friend, offers to help him find a roommate to share the rent. Turns out the new roommate is Cheetah aka Chatree, Tum’s gay friend who used to be secretly in love with him. Tum cut off his friendship with Cheetah a long time ago because Cheetah tricked him to believe that he was straight.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: This series is about three friends retelling their first year in college together. Chatri tries to stay in the closet due to his military general father; Oil is a rich and arrogant woman who thinks she is the best, and Tum is a charming Casanova who wants to go to the big city and meet girls. When Oil falls for Chatri, Chatri falls for Tum, and Tum falls for beautiful girls in college, drama and comedy unfolds.
